examples.question: A coin is heads up. Scotty flips the coin. Edgar flips the coin. Hanna flips the coin. Austin flips the coin. Is the coin still heads up? Note that "flip" here means "reverse".
A coin is heads up. Denis does not flip the coin. Gigi flips the coin. Heather does not flip the coin. Ginger flips the coin. Is the coin still heads up? Note that "flip" here means "reverse".
